snippet.title: Mario Vs. Sonic minigame
snippet.description:
I'm sure it's Sonic and Mario fangame #234234234. Or somewhere close.

Whatever. Either way this was for a minigame competition, where it had to be Mario and some other series. I went through 2 games for that one but I ended up liking this idea better then the other, so I continued with this. It's like the smoothest engine I've ever made and I might use it again for something.

Anyways yeah there's only 3 levels because lazy, not enough time, etc. Mario Vs. Mighty, Bean, and Sonic. There was gonna be more but that's all I got to. Maybe i'll finish it someday but I doubt it. I've said that about ALL of my games. Yes all of them.

Also Sonic is retarded and won't stop jumping and I get hurt when he jumps. So I died like 3 times. :'(

Game for people who like to play stuff:
http://www.savefile.com/files/912828
